text: “Israelia dɨkavigh danganir igharazimɨn mangɨsɨ damutɨ, Aron uan otariba ko Purirpenimɨn aven itir biziba bar da noeghtɨ, Kohatɨn adarazi izɨ bizir kaba ateram. Arazir kamɨn, me bizir bar zuruzibar suighan kogham. Puvatɨghtɨ, me arɨghiregham. Kohatɨn adarasi, God bativamin Purirpenimɨn biziba ateramin ingangarir kam iti.
